Title: Light Box Control for Asp.Net
Description: Lightbox control for asp.net is used to display the thumbnail images. on clicking the thumbnail images the original images is displayed in the light box effect.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Lightbox control for asp.net is used to display the thumbnail images. on clicking the thumbnail images the original images is displayed in the light box effect.


Visit http://www.sharepoint-controls.com to download latest version of assembly and example of using this control.

Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.
